t: Best NVR to use, open to all brands? | IP Cam Talk
s: I used various brands of DVR since 2009 until, a few weeks ago I decided to buy an Amcrest NV4116E-A2 16 channel NVR. It had (note the tense) 8 PoE ports. It worked weel enough and I bought a majority of Amcrest cameras to work with it. I also had 3 generic ONVIF cameras. I got them all working with the help folk in this forum. I found the NVR to be limiting in what it would allow me to do. I ended up sending it back to Amazon ...
